newsitem.title: CHINA: China Jan-Oct tin exports slip 11.3 pct yr-on-yr.
newsitem.headline: China Jan-Oct tin exports slip 11.3 pct yr-on-yr.

text.p: China's exports of unwrought tin and tin alloys slumped to 27,137 tonnes in the first 10 months of 1996, down 11.3 percent compared with the year-ago period, customs figures showed on Wednesday.
Tin exports were 3,222 tonnes in October alone.
China exported 30,603 tonnes of tin in the first 10 months of 1995, the figures showed.
